duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute business plan for assigned portfolio of properties
Manage Property Managers and Area Managers, providing mentorship and ensuring compliance with corporate policies
Review and approve property purchasing expenditures in adherence to budget
Develop marketing budgets and plans, monitor ad effectiveness, and engage in revenue management pricing
Oversight of marketing activities, review market comps, economic information, lead and follow-up reports, and screening results
Assist with RFP responses, participate in pitches, and ensure property-specific front-end technology utilization
Manage property risk management, safety standards, and liability, and work with Property Managers and Maintenance Supervisors
Act as the main point of contact related to all property-related items with owner representative
Remain in a stationary position (sit or stand) for 85% of the time, and travel up to 60% of the time

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred, Real Estate License required
